title: Twilio Voice API
description: Learn the basic operation of Twilio's Programmable Voice APIs.

flavorTextOverrides.readyToMelt: These chests are packed with Malachite ready to be shipped off planet.
flavorTextOverrides.shippingManifest: This area is designed to simulate a mining base for Malachite, a substance that can be melted down to make copper wires for telephone lines. This simulation is pretty detailed - this shipping manifest looks so boring that it feels real.
flavorTextOverrides.freshlyMined: This base really produces a lot of ore!
flavorTextOverrides.vats: Looks like some melted Malachite. I'm sure this is important for science!
flavorTextOverrides.pipe: I think melted Malachite flows through this valve.
